dynamic-hibernate.query:
SELECT msgStorage_Id, name, ip, port, system_Status, manual_Status FROM CSL_MSG_STORAGE WHERE 1=1 #if($msgStorage_Id) AND msgStorage_Id = :msgStorage_Id #end #if($name) AND name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND manual_Status = :manual_Status #end
ORDER BY msgStorage_Id desc

SELECT msgStorage_Id, name, ip, port, system_Status, manual_Status FROM CSL_MSG_STORAGE WHERE 1=1 #if($msgStorage_Id) AND msgStorage_Id = :msgStorage_Id #end #if($name) AND name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND manual_Status <> :manual_Status #end
ORDER BY msgStorage_Id desc
